version_description:
- Fixes bug with not being able to go back from a users uploads -> profile.
- Fixes bug with user search field being updated 1 character less at a time.
- Fixes bug with not being able to block users.
- Fixes minor bug in top 25 list.

- Fixes bug with not being able to go back from a users uploads -> profile.
- Fixes bug with user search field being updated 1 character less at a time.
- Fixes bug with not being able to block users.
- Fixes minor bug in top 25 list.

◈ MASSIVE SEEDS LITE UPDATE! DON'T FORGET TO UPDATE TO FIX ALL THE BUGS AND GET TONS OF NEW FEATURES! ◈

—- NEW features
- BRAND NEW PM REVAMP! Now FINALLY possible to PM multiple users and followers at the same time! Swipe to delete old PM sessi

◈ MASSIVE SEEDS LITE UPDATE! DON'T FORGET TO UPDATE TO FIX ALL THE BUGS AND GET TONS OF NEW FEATURES! ◈

—- NEW features
- BRAND NEW PM REVAMP! Now FINALLY possible to PM multiple users and followers at the same time! Swipe to delete old PM sessi
- Fixes director class error bug. Sorry about this bug everyone, it was caused due to a glitch in recent Facebook sharing changes but has now been fixed and should not occur again.
- Fixes director class error bug. Sorry about this bug everyone, it was caused due to a glitch in recent Facebook sharing changes but has now been fixed and should not occur again.
- Few bugfixes and other improvements.
- Few bugfixes and other improvements.

- Fixes bug with not being able to view pending uploads.
- Fixed comment voting for video comments.

- Fixes bug with not being able to view pending uploads.
- Fixed comment voting for video comments.

- Fixes rare device exclusive bug which made it impossible to sort comments by Newest / Top Rated.
- Various bugfixes and improvements.

- Fixes rare device exclusive bug which made it impossible to sort comments by Newest / Top Rated.
- Various bugfixes and improvements.

— NEW FEATURES
- (LITE!) Now possible for LITE users to follow favorite uploaders!
- Added Guess The Block to in-app highscores.
- Added option to opt-out from Report processed notifications.
- Added response system to reports.

— BUGS F

— NEW FEATURES
- (LITE!) Now possible for LITE users to follow favorite uploaders!
- Added Guess The Block to in-app highscores.
- Added option to opt-out from Report processed notifications.
- Added response system to reports.

— BUGS F

- Fixes OS-related issue which caused seed links to stop work on some devices.
- Updated userlinks to use a much easier format! Now simply use the links ”seeds://@myUserTag” to link directly to your profile!
- Featured seeds now fully available on S

- Fixes OS-related issue which caused seed links to stop work on some devices.
- Updated userlinks to use a much easier format! Now simply use the links ”seeds://@myUserTag” to link directly to your profile!
- Featured seeds now fully available on S

Update changes 8.0.1

- Faster loading of profile pictures.
- Search fields now automatically highlight directly when tapping on search icon.

- Improved players count in Servers-section.
- Added rotate option to images when in fullscree
